Reviews.Content: Satisfied! I stayed at this hotel on a stopover from Baltimore to Hawaii and since i had spent most of my funds on my Hawaiian vacation i was forced to stay at a budget hotel instead of a big brand name one. I can say i was pleasantly surprised by the all start hotel. It provided basic amenities and was a clean place. I have no real complaints about the hotel. The only way i could see this being a bad experience is if we had expected to get more for our money. We knowingly booked and expected a budget hotel and thats what we got. Anybody expecting anything else is in for a real disappointment.Hope this review helped. Happy traveling all!
Reviews.Author: bmoneyman

Reviews.Content: Dirt cheap dive This dive hotel is on the fringe of the Mission district, surrounded by hookers and naer-do-wells. The upside is that the rent is $150 weekly for a shared bath arrangement, and the desk is manned 24/7. They also have a communal kitchen, which is really a counter, sink and an oven/stove.For the price it's probably one of the better deals in SF if you're on a serious budget.The usual disaffected Indian Patel SF monopoly runs the joint, so service is unfriendly and spotty.-k
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
